ingredients: 4 (8 ounce) packages reduced-fat cream cheese, softened, 2 cups brown sugar, 4 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1 pound fresh strawberries, coarsely chopped , 1  fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and chopped, 1 pound seedless grapes, halved, 1 pint blueberries, 25  clear, plastic (10 ounce) cups, 12  sugar cookies, crushed, 2  kiwis, peeled and sliced
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 11%, Saturated Fat 5g 23%, Cholesterol 24mg 8%, Sodium 138mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 34g 12%, Dietary Fiber 2g 7%, Total Sugars 23g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 46mg 228%, Calcium 67mg 5%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 231mg 5%
